On 05.01.2009, at 19:55, amsmota@... wrote:

> UriTemplate, I think it belongs to the JSR-311 specification, or at  
> least belongs to Jersey.

Not really; JSR 311 relied on this (although Marc Hadley, the spec co- 
lead, co-authored it):

http://bitworking.org/projects/URI-Templates/spec/draft-gregorio-uritemplate-03.html

(Expired, but I couldn't find a newer version.)

Stefan
